resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/157221</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157221</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2894</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">To change you must act.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sie zu ändern muß fungieren.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vous changer doit agir.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mudá-lo deve agir.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cambiarli devono comportarsi.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Για να αλλάξετε πρέπει να ενεργήσετε.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cambiarle debe actuar.</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An interactive online unit about which deals with the ways in which we can make a changes in the community. Includes an activity to write a letter to a top national leader</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">online unit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">community</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine interaktive Onlinemaßeinheit, über die die Methoden
beschäftigt, in denen wir Änderungen in der Gemeinschaft vornehmen 
können. Schließt eine Aktivität ein, um einen Brief zu 
schreiben einem oberen nationalen Führer</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une unité en ligne interactive au sujet dont traite les 
voies desquelles nous pouvons faire des changements de la communauté.
Inclut une activité pour écrire une lettre à une amorce 
nationale supérieure</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma unidade em linha interativa sobre que trata das 
maneiras em que nós podemos fazer mudanças na comunidade. 
Inclui uma atividade para escrever uma letra a um líder 
nacional superior</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'unità in linea interattiva circa cui si occupa dei 
modi in cui possiamo fare i cambiamenti nella Comunità. Include
un'attività per scrivere una lettera ad un capo nazionale 
superiore</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια διαλογική σε απευθείας σύνδεση μονάδα για την 
οποία εξετάζει τους τρόπους με τους οποίους μπορούμε να κάνουμε 
τις αλλαγές στην κοινότητα. Περιλαμβάνει μια δραστηριότητα 
για να γράψει μια επιστολή σε έναν κορυφαίο εθνικό ηγέτη</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una unidad en línea interactiva sobre la cual se ocupa de
las maneras de las cuales podemos realizar cambios en la comunidad. 
Incluye una actividad para escribir una letra a un arranque de 
cinta nacional superior</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Onlinemaßeinheit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gemeinschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité en ligne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la communauté</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade em linha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">comunidade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità in linea</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione scritta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Comunità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σε απευθείας σύνδεση μονάδα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραπτή έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κοινότητα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">unidad en línea</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">expresión escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">comunidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <status>

            <value>final</value>
          </status>
          <contribute>
